settings.title: Fabric & Fit
settings.content:
Crafted from a blend of 98% cotton and 2% spandex, our Shorts offer optimal stretch, flexibility, and are perfect for everything from a casual stride to high kicks. Truly, they define comfort in every move.

Our Shorts fit true to size.

üìè For any second guesses, our size guide got your back.

If in doubt or when between sizes we recommend to move one size down. Our Shorts are designed in such a way that it still fits perfectly and wears extremely comfortable.

settings.title: Details
settings.content:
It's all in the details:

  • Partly elasticated waistband and a super comfortable fit.
  • High quality zipper and a Frankster branded button - fancy but fuss-free.
  • Two large polyester lined side-pockets, because you are worth it. Plus a secret zippered pocket on the right-hand side so you never lose your valuables. Big enough to fit the latest iPhone or Android - no judgement here.
  • A pocket at the back
  • Belt loops on the waistband for those times you wanna jazz it up with a belt (be it for office showdowns or wedding throw-downs).

settings.title: Put On, Do Good, Give Back
settings.content:
• Designed in Australia, our Shorts are made from certified cotton, ensuring ethical production every step of the way.
  • We donate 10% of our profits to Movember. This comes out of our pocket. Not yours!

settings.title: Care
settings.content:
Slide into your Frankster Shorts day in, day out.

For a fresh feel, give them a cold whirl in the machine (keep it at or below 30¬∞C).

And remember, let them air dry naturally ‚Äì no tumble drying here.

settings.title: 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
settings.content:
• FAST FREE SHIPPING: Orders are dispatched within 24hrs. And Shipping is always Free!
  • FREE RETURNS: Comfortably enjoy your Frankster's. In case for whatever reason you are not satisfied you can exchange or return your products within 100 days after ordering, hassle free! That is a promise and reflects how much we believe in our products.

settings.richtext: BEST FOR: Happy Hours, Sunny days, Zoom-calls, BBQs Bashes, Pretentious Rooftop Bars, Hole-in-one‚Äôs
COMFORT; Partial elasticated waistband and our stretch-cotton magic create the ultimate level of comfort
POCKETS; 4 large pockets incl. a hidden zippered pocket for valuable things that can‚Äôt be lost, even during (after)parties

settings.text: Nothing will make your thighs look as good as these.

settings.title: How does the 100% Satisfaction Guarantee work?
settings.answer:
Love your Franksters or your money back! FREE SHIPPING & FREE RETURNS FOR 100 DAYS.

We want you to love your Franksters! If they don't fit just right, no dramas. Use our easy returns process and we'll swap 'em out for a different size faster than you can crack a coldie.

Shop stress-free! If ya don't love your Franksters, swap 'em out or get a full refund. No worries!

Good Thighbrations!

settings.title: When will my order ship?
settings.answer:
Your¬†products will be dispatched within 24hr and often much quicker than that. All orders placed before midnight (00:00) will be at the carrier before 10AM¬†next morning each workday. Orders placed during weekend will be with the carrier before 10AM on Monday.

That way you can have the Shorts as quickly as humanly possible.

settings.title: How long will it take for the Shorts to arrive?
settings.answer:
After your order has been shipped it will take 2-6 business days for your order to arrive. You can closely follow this with your tracking number.

The Shorts are shipped from Melbourne.

settings.title: What size should I order if I'm in between sizes?
settings.answer:
if you find yourself caught between sizes, opting for the smaller size is usually the best choice.

Our Shorts are designed in such a way that it still fits perfectly and wears extremely comfortable.

Check out our size guide here

settings.title: What should I do if my item doesn't fit?
settings.answer:
We offer free returns and exchanges within 100 days of purchasing so you can get the size that works best for you.

Log in to your account to get the Returns or Exchange process started.

settings.title: What is the relationship with Movember?
settings.answer:
We proudly support Movember.

Frankster pledges to donate 10% of its profits to Movember. Additionally, we'll be rolling out initiatives throughout the year to bolster our support.
